name: Dodge I
description:
Dodge I - is an action/tactic game where you need to dodge red and yellow bullets with arrow keys.

Game have a bunch of different mechanics like shield, or score for doging with bullet fly close to you. Also game is an arcade, so you can't really win in this game, so you play to get as much score as you can, after defeat you can see your score with total dodges and hits that you did't dodged.

All music in game is written by me, so no copyright claims on youtube.
